The 19th, clouds were in the sky, the south wind blew; in the afternoon, very overcast. Night of the 20th, clouds were in the sky; last part of the night, very overcast ... [...]

[...] ... very overcast?, a little rain shower, the south wind blew. Around the 20th, Saturn’s last appearance in Scorpius. [...] the south wind blew. Night of the 23rd, last part of the night, the moon was 7? [cubits] below ϑ Leonis [...]

[... at the end of the month, 2 kurru 3 sūtu 1/2 qa ...] 1 kurru 5 sūtu; mustard, 4 kurru; cress, 1 pānu 1 sūtu; sesame, 1 pānu 3 qa, at the end of the month, 1 pānu 1 sūtu; wool, 4 minas were sold for 1 shekel of silver [...]
